uk.co.crider.jablus.gui.jump

Class ColourRampStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.gui.jump.ColourRampStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vividsolutions.jump.workbench.ui.renderer.style.Style, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ColourRampStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.vividsolutions.jump.workbench.ui.renderer.style.Style
    An extension of Jump's style to represent a colour ramp. Maps a numeric value to a colour gradient with any number of colour reference points

    • Constructor Summary
